Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: My psychologist wouldn't count .3 as a gain, anything below .5 is considered a fluctuation. Any weight gain is likely to be food and fluid. I know it doesn't feel like it, but your metabolism will catch up with what you are eating and eventually you'll need more and more for any actual gain to happen. I was eating 3500+ calories in ip to make a minimum gain of 500 grams a week.
